pages.text: I'll tell you about the different mobs here
The new and improved villager girl! No more Squidward-nosed freaks of nature!
Trust me on this one...she is definitely lewd...Name her this and...oh God...you can also name her anything with the "-Chan" suffix...
This gal is from...*gags*...human erotic anime images...Luckily she's in a bikini rn...
A bikini babe who wanders the world after dark...although I don't understand why...
I don't get why humans think this is ok...thank God OptiFine doesn't work with this book...This also applies to the Sandy and Diver girls and the Giant...
She lives in the desert with her gal pals...but she's kinda oddly dressed...
Now this girl knows how to dress properly! But why water...
Dogs are so stupid...Chaos made ALL the skeletons out of Scooby Snacks...even the horse AND the mutant one...
Is this guy ok...? He's kinda overflowing with energy...
Oh...now it all makes sense...
Looks like the illagers got some new looks too!
You're kidding me...right...? Same rules as the villager...
Damn, this chick lookin good! Her cloak even glows!
Stop...please...
Sharp shot, girl!
Please...shoot me...
Girl, you must got me under your spells, 'cuz you're glowin!
Tell me this is an illusion...please...
JESUS FUCK!!! SHE'S HUGE!!!
Um...is that...blood...?
That Snow Golem looks familiar...
Remember when Notch did a bad with the pig? This is when Chaos gets a hold of this info and learns resourcepacks...
Turn the creeper into a pig, vise-versa must apply...dammit...
Multi-Color pandas! Each kind of panda now has its own special color, how cute!
Guess who! It's yours truly!
Who the fuck opened the dog door...? I specifically closed it so this walking flea-circus couldn't get in...
Oh my! Guess you wouldn't wanna go around w/o a skin lookin like this! XDDDD
Goddammit, Chaos...You left your resourcepack full of bugs again...
The eyes appear different, they change color based on its name (1 of the 16 in MC), and their color' initials are etched on top of its shell
Who put the masks on the turtles again...not every single one is a TMNT....
